Package capricorn

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Capricorn
    The lay-out of this main class is kept rather simple.
    HoneypotManager
    Manages the honeypots and all honeypot related activities
    Library
    The library functions as a database for Capricorn
    Shutdowner
    Manages the shutdown functions based on the operating system that is used
    Utilities
    This class contains utilities that are used in multiple classes.
    Watcher
    The watcher is the monitoring service of Capricorn
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Arguments
    An enum is used to prevent typos in the code and to keep the structure clean and clear for other programmers
